stories.text: Since getting rid of all military in the world sounds utopian at this moment, UN can take a first step in this direction by asking its member countries to change military oath in their countries. Soldiers take oath to protect their countries on their soil, but are not obligated to participate in wars in foreign lands even if it sounds by politicians as "protecting motherland"
stories.title: Military Hack, Changing Oath

stories.text:
I have been coding for 5 years only python, i learned all by myself, i am able to built working stuff,
But it is all hacked, really bad structure, habits, no testing, little use of classes, debugging or adding new code is a nightmare and take so long time...
So i am looking for a way to being a advance level python programer, being able to work with people, how to structure BIG project, better use of classes, and just advance python in general.
I don't have much interest in web development, i prefer learn numpy, opencv, that kind of library.
And i would like to get some bases of ML , keras tensorflow ..
Do you recommend any (paid or free) course or ressources for that ? thank you
stories.title: Ask HN: Intermediate to Advance in Python?
